full_output.summary: motivated Highly Computer Engineer with intermediate level of programming skills,an enthusiasts towards Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Aspiring to a part of an esteemed organization that could help me reach the zenith of success.

experiences.description: Build a banking application using Core Java. Build a clothing website using OpenWeaver Studio. Developed the UI design for the project,generated the image dataset from the Canva. User authentication and validation of user email id and password. Storing the login id records in the database of the OpenWeaver Studio.

Implemented Machine learning algorithm, build a simple linear regression model to predict air quality Index (AQI) in Mumbai City for the year 2022. Collaborated with a team of data engineers to design and train learning modelsfor data processing,testing and achieving a 15% reduction in false positive rates. Collected the dataset from CPCB website via api key. Demonstrated expertise in data visualisation using Matplotlib, seaborn, pandas, numpy and cartopy library for plotting Mumbai City with AQI Index on a Global Map.
